tool_description: Easiest way to get all product details, reviews, offers and searches products by queries.
title: Amazon Data Scraper-2

api_list.name: Get Amazon product reviews

product.name: Titan Men's Neo Quartz Watch with Leather Calfskin Strap, Brown, 22 (Model: 1584SL03)

top_positive_review.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2018
top_positive_review.title: Great wristwatch from a reputed Company
top_positive_review.review: This is a great watch. Titan is a very well known brand in India and they make quality watches. The movement is also in-house build, ensuring perfect alignment of hands with the hour/minute/ second marks. The watch looks gorgeous in real life. I have been wearing this watch for past two weeks and getting many compliments on it.  It keeps time pretty accurately and hasn't lost even a minute yet. The only thing I kind of dislike is the band; it is slightly short ( I have a big wrist) and doesn't seem to be of superior quality, but for $40 only, top grain leather can't be expected either. Overall, I highly recommend this watch.

top_critical_review.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2018
top_critical_review.title: Would be a better if it actually kept better time!
top_critical_review.review: Nice look, decent fit, easy to read. It would be even better if it kept better time. It gains and then loses the gains again as much as two minutes a day right out of the box when checked vs the always updated and accurate time on the PC. Nothing that will make you late but should be better.

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2018
reviews.title: Great wristwatch from a reputed Company
reviews.review: This is a great watch. Titan is a very well known brand in India and they make quality watches. The movement is also in-house build, ensuring perfect alignment of hands with the hour/minute/ second marks. The watch looks gorgeous in real life. I have been wearing this watch for past two weeks and getting many compliments on it.  It keeps time pretty accurately and hasn't lost even a minute yet. The only thing I kind of dislike is the band; it is slightly short ( I have a big wrist) and doesn't seem to be of superior quality, but for $40 only, top grain leather can't be expected either. Overall, I highly recommend this watch.

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2019
reviews.title: Beautiful and Good Quality Watch at a Great Value
reviews.review: Got this for bf for Christmas. He’s not a watch person but asked for one anyway; “subtitle with no metal.” No white, beige or black faces. Ok, sooo brown it is! Fine, I’ve always preferred the brown ones best anyway. This one definitely did it! He loved it (or, at least, said he did :) ).The size is perfect - not too big or gaudy. The face color is a beautiful dark brown bronze that seems to change in the light. Face design is classy and doesn’t have a weird forgein name with random letters that doesn’t mean anything.For the price I was weary of its quality. However, it’s been ticking perfectly for two months now and the straps/pieces are as new. Granted, it’s not worn everyday so I don’t know how it’d hold up with that.The one thing I was dissatisfied with was the box it came in. Seeing as it was a gift this was a bit important to me. It had a couple of barcode stickers on it (why?) and when I carefully tried to peel them off paper from the box came off with them. So, cheap paperboard box. But since that has nothing to do with the watch itself, I’m keeping it at five stars.I’m happy to recommend this watch, especially if you don’t want to spend tons of dough. It’s a great value!

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2019
reviews.title: A great purchase
reviews.review: I received my Titan watch promptly and in excellent condition.  It was well wrapped for shipping.  The watch is beautiful.  The grey face with a brown leather band is very classic looking and you don't always see this combination.  I collect watches and I'm glad I found this one.  Good price too.  Thank you,  Joe  A.  Joseph

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2019
reviews.title: Titan Mens Work Wear Watch
reviews.review: I really like this watch, it was exactly what I was looking for.  I perform alot of hands on electro-mechanical tasks for work.  This watch appears to be very sturdy, but time will tell.  I just received the watch a couple of weeks ago, and started wearing, I have only been wearing it for a week now.  I have always worn Seiko watches that cost twice as much as this Titan watch, they hold up for at least a couple of years, I hope this watch holds up for at least that long.

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2019
reviews.title: Affordable Quality.
reviews.review: This is my first TITAN watch purchase and I think it's one of the best values I have ever added to my collection.The dial is beautiful and the watch has the overall quality that I rarely find in much higher priced pieces.The strap is of good leather and has a complimentary color that sets off the color contrast with the Sunday-style dial.I will purchase more watches of this brand.

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2019
reviews.title: What an awesome watch!
reviews.review: I have had this watch now for about a month, and I could not be any more thrilled with the watch. I had not heard of Titan watches before making the purchase, but I was in the market for a few watches and saw the watch and their prices and decided to take a shot. Since then I have bought four other Titan watches. These watches are beautiful, durable and of high quality for the price. I had no problem setting the watch, or the watch keeping time. I'm a fan for life!

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2018
reviews.title: Would be a better if it actually kept better time!
reviews.review: Nice look, decent fit, easy to read. It would be even better if it kept better time. It gains and then loses the gains again as much as two minutes a day right out of the box when checked vs the always updated and accurate time on the PC. Nothing that will make you late but should be better.

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2019
reviews.title: No complaints

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2018
reviews.title: The watch is very nice. Looks classy on hand like really classy
reviews.review: The watch is very nice. Looks classy on hand like really classy. The only one thing that has happened is when we opened the package, the part for regulating the time and the date, was already outside the watch. It was broken so we decided to return it back, but reorder it again.

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2019
reviews.title: So Far - So Good
reviews.review: Nice looking basic watch - purchased to replace my daily.  It was received as scheduled and was well packaged.  I tried to adjust (size) the band myself, but failed.  Had to bring it to a jeweler - $5 well spent.

api_list.description: gets product details by unique product id

body.name: Titan Workwear Men’s Designer Dress Watch | Quartz, Water Resistant, Stainless Steel or Leather Band
body.product_category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Men › Watches › Wrist Watches
body.small_description:
CONTEMPORARY DESIGN: These men’s dress watches are the perfect timepieces for professional dress to formal wear; select from stainless steel, metal or genuine leather straps to suit your personal style and preference
PRECISION TIMEKEEPING WITH DATE: Smooth quartz movement and superior craftsmanship keeps accurate time all-day and all-night long
ROUND ANALOG DISPLAY: Large round sunray dial and stick markers ensure easy reading
DURABLE SCRATCH PROOF DISPLAY: High performance componentry and 42mm case with a clear mineral glass window provides scratch resistance to withstand everyday use
SWEAT AND WATER RESISTANCE: Water resistant to 50m (165ft); suitable for short periods of recreational swimming or showering, but not diving or snorkeling
